d415956deb14.description: Home to some of the best stories on medium. Look around, relax and enjoy one with a sip of coffee.
d415956deb14.name: The Coffeelicious
d415956deb14.shortDescription: Home to some of the best stories on medium.

870d99a86b94.title: Both time and money are functions of perception.

paragraphs.text: Both time and money are functions of perception. For example, the sole purpose of the Federal Reserve is to manage the perceived value of its currency. The poem is fantastic, by the way. What we say, how we behave, reflects our perception of reality, on stage, for others to see. The richness that resides in diversity.
paragraphs.name: ebc9

feab08fbcaae.title: …then wash your hands and your socks.

paragraphs.text: …then wash your hands and your socks.
paragraphs.name: 40af

537e4293c26.title: Reminds me of a favorite phrase.

paragraphs.text: Reminds me of a favorite phrase. “Love is spelled t-i-m-e.” Both are more important than toilet paper — as long as at the moment, you don’t need toilet paper. Or you have clean socks. Sorry, I came for my moment of zen and guess I started to wander.
Thank you.
paragraphs.name: 84d6

paragraphs.text: Exactly! ;)
paragraphs.name: 4a03

fe061359486d.title: Money is only time if you don’t have to exchange time for it.

paragraphs.text: Money is only time if you don’t have to exchange time for it.
paragraphs.name: e016

paragraphs.text: Especially if you work retail…
paragraphs.name: f59d

ffff068375bc.title: Barter is kinda fun until you have to load up the car with goats and chickens to pay the hotel bill…

paragraphs.text: Barter is kinda fun until you have to load up the car with goats and chickens to pay the hotel bill when traveling.
paragraphs.name: 17dc

297406d4c6de.title: Time isn’t money but money is time.

paragraphs.text: Time isn’t money but money is time.
paragraphs.name: 8d03

d8bed178541c.title: Thanks so much for this timely poem (how could i resist?)

paragraphs.text: Thanks so much for this timely poem (how could i resist?) I like it a lot. Our son has always been enamored with money (my husband and I, not so much. We are happy with what we have). The stork dropped you over the wrong house, I keep telling him.
paragraphs.name: 5a9a

paragraphs.text: A soul doesn’t exist.
paragraphs.name: f21a

3572470d3f66.title: It’s hard to rent rooms for them, too. :)

paragraphs.text: It’s hard to rent rooms for them, too. :)
paragraphs.name: a8ad

249e26c38d1c.title: Time is a gas: it expands, contracts, freezes, explodes, leaks away, goes anywhere under pressure.

paragraphs.text: Time is a gas: it expands, contracts, freezes, explodes, leaks away, goes anywhere under pressure. Its tank is the imagination, its pipelines the necessities and wishes of one life, its pressure gauge the stomach, its fail-safe the bladder. It is NOT a constant, it is volatile.
paragraphs.name: c0d8

virtuals.subtitle: Money, by contrast, is an oil: it coats, protects, lubricates, cools, can be burned but makes an awful mess when it is, and makes things…

content.subtitle: Money, by contrast, is an oil: it coats, protects, lubricates, cools, can be burned but makes an awful mess when it is, and makes things…

df6f479174bc.title: Money is simply a portable medium of exchange with an agreed upon value per unit.

paragraphs.text: Money is simply a portable medium of exchange with an agreed upon value per unit. Of itself, it is benign. Once it is touched by humans, things get complicated.
paragraphs.name: ed08

paragraphs.text: The importance or influence of money on time is inverse to its quantity.
paragraphs.name: 0c05

virtuals.subtitle: The importance or influence of money on time is inverse to its quantity.

content.subtitle: The importance or influence of money on time is inverse to its quantity.

paragraphs.text: Time Isn’t Money
paragraphs.name: 517f

paragraphs.text: Time isn’t money;
paragraphs.name: 0e8d

paragraphs.text:
time is your soul
bleeding out
onto your socks.
paragraphs.name: e991

paragraphs.text: Good observations, Harper. Thanks.

c93dbd2ed33e.name: Harper Thorpe
c93dbd2ed33e.bio: Became a louder, more engaged citizen in 2017. Been told I'm proof weirdness can strike anywhere, anytime. I'm good with that. Opposing views are a good thing!

847aefd9080e.bio: There's nights that I can't even walk, there's days I couldn't get a fuck and in between is where I'm stuck.

bdc93f756837.name: Ron Collins
bdc93f756837.bio: The bland acquiescence of a middle class, for its own amoral self-preservation and the upholding of its insular privileges, is the foundation of all tyranny
